snippet: Former students are pushing for more proactive support and healing for those who were abused as school officials grapple with how to address the scandal.
abstract: Alumni of Horace Mann School in the Bronx are criticizing school's response to recent reports of sexual abuse of students by teachers, calling for more proactive support and healing for those who were abused; revelations come at a particularly bad time for the school, as it seeks donations to raise $90 million for new facilities while grappling with the scandal.
lead_paragraph: Former students are pushing for more proactive support and healing for those who were abused as school officials grapple with how to address the scandal.

headline.seo: Alumni Criticism Grows Over Horace Mann’s Response to Reports of Sexual Abuse
